The last day of the real tournament is not used by the Fantasy Challenge, because only a small number of players are left in the tournament at that point.\n\nPoints earned during the Main Event will be multiplied by 4. "DOTA_TIP_2013_MM_Blurb_5"	"Sven and Leshrac have been laning together since early Dota, and when you add Visage, you have a terrific trilane. On the other side, we have a greedy lineup relying on Weaver's ability to farm, and the initiation powers of Magnus and Clockwerk. Will Keeper of the Light hold off long enough for his farm intensive team to hit its stride?"
"[english]DOTA_TIP_2013_MM_Blurb_5"	"Sven and Leshrac have been laning together since early Dota, and when you add Visage, you have a terrific trilane. On the other side, we have a greedy lineup relying on Weaver's ability to farm, and the initiation powers of Magnus and Clockwerk. Will Keeper of the Light hold off long enough for his farm intensive team to hit its stride?"
"DOTA_TIP_2013_MM_Rad_5"	"Rising Stars used the following lanes:\nWeaver - Solo Bottom\nMagnus - Solo Mid\nClockwerk - Top\nDark Seer and Keeper of the Light - Jungle\n\nWith four farming heroes in their lineup, Rising Stars objective was to get quick levels. Then they'd use their huge teamfight potential during the mid game by combining Vacuum, Wall, Cogs and Reverse Polarity. However, Magnus had a hard time keeping up to Queen of Pain's pace, the Weaver gave away first blood to VG's trilane, and a failed gank attempt on Lone Druid by Dark Seer gave away a free kill. At 17 minutes, Vici Gaming got their first Roshan, and Rising Stars started losing control of the game. Even thought they got some kills, the need for their lineup to be in the middle of the action cost them more than they could get. While the lineup is good enough to hold off for 40 minutes, even at a disadvantage, eventually Vici Gaming wins a decisive fight and takes the game."
"[english]DOTA_TIP_2013_MM_Rad_5"	"Rising Stars used the following lanes:\nWeaver - Solo Bottom\nMagnus - Solo Mid\nClockwerk - Top\nDark Seer and Keeper of the Light - Jungle\n\nWith four farming heroes in their lineup, Rising Stars objective was to get quick levels. Then they'd use their huge teamfight potential during the mid game by combining Vacuum, Wall, Cogs and Reverse Polarity. However, Magnus had a hard time keeping up to Queen of Pain's pace, the Weaver gave away first blood to VG's trilane, and a failed gank attempt on Lone Druid by Dark Seer gave away a free kill. At 17 minutes, Vici Gaming got their first Roshan, and Rising Stars started losing control of the game. Even thought they got some kills, the need for their lineup to be in the middle of the action cost them more than they could get. While the lineup is good enough to hold off for 40 minutes, even at a disadvantage, eventually Vici Gaming wins a decisive fight and takes the game."
"DOTA_TIP_2013_MM_Dire_5"	"Vici Gaming used the following lanes:\nLone Druid - Solo Top\nQueen of Pain - Solo Mid\nVisage, Leshrac and Sven - Bottom\n\nQueen of Pain controlled the Mid lane, and Lone Druid was able to fend off Clockwerk and Dark Seer by means of a few lucky entangles and good support rotations. After the trilane secured an early kill on Weaver, they left Sven to solo against the Weaver, allowing Leshrac and Visage to roam. The sheer burst power of Queen of Pain combined with Leshrac and Visage allowed Vici Gaming to gain control of the early game, and take their first Roshan at 17 minutes. Once in control, they chose not to rush, instead focusing on controlling the map and getting ahead in farm. After taking a second Roshan at 28 minutes, they waited for Rising Stars to make a mistake. Finally, at 40 minutes in, where the gold and xp advantages were enough for Vici Gaming to overwhelm Rising Stars with brute force, they were able to win a decisive fight and claim victory."
"[english]DOTA_TIP_2013_MM_Dire_5"	"Vici Gaming used the following lanes:\nLone Druid - Solo Top\nQueen of Pain - Solo Mid\nVisage, Leshrac and Sven - Bottom\n\nQueen of Pain controlled the Mid lane, and Lone Druid was able to fend off Clockwerk and Dark Seer by means of a few lucky entangles and good support rotations. After the trilane secured an early kill on Weaver, they left Sven to solo against the Weaver, allowing Leshrac and Visage to roam. The sheer burst power of Queen of Pain combined with Leshrac and Visage allowed Vici Gaming to gain control of the early game, and take their first Roshan at 17 minutes. Once in control, they chose not to rush, instead focusing on controlling the map and getting ahead in farm. After taking a second Roshan at 28 minutes, they waited for Rising Stars to make a mistake. Finally, at 40 minutes in, where the gold and xp advantages were enough for Vici Gaming to overwhelm Rising Stars with brute force, they were able to win a decisive fight and claim victory."

"npc_dota_hero_ember_spirit_bio"	"在悲慟山脈的失落之地裡，有一座荒廢已久的火光堡壘，堡壘內的修練聽已經空無一人，庭園裡滿是落葉和灰塵。被封閉的火光寺裡放著一口滿載著遠古灰燼的玉釜，這是當年戰地詩人——炘的火葬之地。炘培養了整整三代衛火盟的弟子，從修身養性的真經到強身健體的武藝，炘悉心教導在江湖闖蕩所需的一切本領。然而傳授習武之道時也不得不面臨弟子在外惹來的對手。在炘的暮年，他不敵對手而慘遭誅僇，旗下的的弟子在此後也分崩離析。轉眼之間就過了數十年甚至數個世紀，他的傳人成了亡途後裔，而他的教義最終也消逝無蹤。後來有孜孜不倦的燃燒天神因他所傳承的師德打動，慕名下凡來到火光堡壘，重新點燃了灰燼。閃耀的餘燼之中浮現出炘的面容。在火焰環繞之下他已準備好繼續傳授教義，讓知識的薪火得以相傳。"
"[english]npc_dota_hero_ember_spirit_bio"	"Lost within the Wailing Mountains, the Fortress of Flares lay abandoned, its training halls empty, its courtyard covered in leaves and dust. Upon a dais in its sealed temple rests a topaz cauldron filled with ancient ash, remnants of a pyre for the warrior-poet Xin. For three generations, Xin taught his acolytes the Bonds of the Guardian Flame, a series of mantras to train the mind and body for the harsh realities beyond the fortress walls. However, in teaching a warrior's way he earned a warrior's rivals, and in his autumn Xin was bested and slain. His followers spread to the wind. Yet as years turned to centuries and followers to descendants, his teachings endured by subtle whisper and deed. Touched by the teacher's lasting legacy, the Burning Celestial, inquisitive aspect of fire, cast himself to the Fortress of Flares and reignited the pyre ash. From these glowing embers emerged an image of Xin, wreathed in flame, his thoughtful countenance prepared to train and to teach, and to spread the fires of knowledge to all who seek guidance."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulder_smash"	"巨礫碎擊"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulder_smash"	"Boulder Smash"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulder_smash_Description"	"大地之靈猛烈打擊指定的敵方單位、友方單位或者殘岩，使其朝對應的方向被擊退一段距離。被擊退的目標將傷害沿途所碰撞到的單位。若大地之靈藉由瞄準地點進行施放，那麼他將選擇身旁 %remnant_smash_radius_tooltip% 範圍內距離自己最近的殘岩為施放目標。若擊退目標為殘岩，其擊退距離將會更遠，且被殘岩撞到的目標還將受到暈眩。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_boulder_smash_Description"	"Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest Stone Remnant in a %remnant_smash_radius_tooltip% radius. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also stunned. Stone Remnants travel further than other units."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_rolling_boulder_Description"	"大地之靈化為巨石接著在經過 %delay%s 秒的延遲後朝目標的方向滾去，對敵方單位造成傷害。大地之靈會隨即在遭到暈眩，或者巨石撞到一名敵方英雄後停下。當大地之靈滾過殘岩時，該次的滾動距離及滾動速度將會大幅提升，並使該次滾動所衝撞到的敵人受到移動速度減緩。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_rolling_boulder_Description"	"Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a %delay%s delay, rolls toward the target location, damaging enemy units. He will stop if he collides with a hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and enemies hit by the boulder will have their movement speed slowed."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_stone_caller"	"殘岩"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_stone_caller"	"Stone Remnant"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_stone_caller_Description"	"在目標地點召喚一尊殘岩。殘岩雖然既無法提供視野也沒有任何實質效用，但是無法被摧毀而且可與大地之靈的其他技能搭配使用。召喚殘岩需消耗使用次數，每隔一段時間就會自動補充。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_stone_caller_Description"	"Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stones Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_magnetize"	"磁化"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_magnetize"	"Magnetize"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_magnetize_Description"	"磁化附近範圍的單位，使對方於短時內持續受到傷害。任何受磁化的英雄都能觸發附近的殘岩並使其爆炸，繼而刷新附近敵方單位身上的磁化持續時間。此過程可重複多次。如有磁化的敵方英雄遭到地磁牽引沉默或巨礫翻滾減速，則其他所有受磁化的英雄將也一併受到影響。\n\n能夠裝備阿哈利姆神杖升級。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_earth_spirit_magnetize_Description"	"Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by silence or slows as a result of Geomagnetic Grip or Rolling Boulder, all magnetized heroes share the effects.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter."

"npc_dota_hero_earth_spirit_bio"	"在斷垣殘壁的深處閃爍著一絲光芒，這是被高地礦工所遺棄的神聖玉石所散發出的，而這稀有的材質被雕塑成高嶺將軍的樣貌。在其身後還綿延著十萬兵馬俑大軍，一支埋葬在地底深處數千年的精銳軍隊。但雕塑者所不知道的是在這神聖玉石散發出的神秘光芒中還蘊含著大地之靈本身，一股原先潛伏在這星球之中的元素之力。當玉石雕像感知到自己受到世界萬物鮮血的雕塑時，千年來便從不止息地吸收這股能量不換匯聚，最終衝破地底重見光明。現在偉大的大地之靈高嶺漫步在地面上，並隨時準備再次召喚那些仍然被土讓擁抱在懷裡的千軍萬馬。"
"[english]npc_dota_hero_earth_spirit_bio"	"Deep amid the Upland crags and cliffs there runs a seam of sacred jade long foresworn by highland miners. From this rare material, the likeness of the great general Kaolin was carved and buried at the head of a stone funerary army ten thousand strong--a force of soldiers and holy men, jesters and acrobats, carved by crafstmen and entombed for millennia in the dark embrace of the Earth.
What the craftsmen had not known was that within the strange seam of jade flowed the spirit of the Earth itself--an elemental force at one with the planet. When the force within the carved jade found itself cut off from the life's blood of the world, it gathered its strength over the course of a thousand years and dug itself free and into the light. Now the great Kaolin Earth Spirit strides the Upland roads, fighting for the spirit of the Earth; and in times of need calls forth remnants of his buried army still locked in the loving embrace of the soil."

"[english]DOTA_Coach_Help"	"Alt-Click in world or minimap to ping. Alt-Click on HUD elements to highlight them. "DOTA_Student_Help"	"如果要和您隊伍的其他成員對話，請取消勾選位於交談輸入欄位下方的「只發送至教練」欄位。若要停止接收來自同隊學生的交談，請在上方的欄位中對他們的名稱進行取消勾選。\n\n只有與您同隊的學生和教練才能聽到您的語音。而透過聊天輪盤所發送出的罐頭文字訊息則會呈現給與您同隊的所有人。"
"[english]DOTA_Student_Help"	"To talk to other players on your team, uncheck the 'Send to Coach Only' box under your chat input. To stop hearing chat and voice communication from a fellow student, uncheck their name in the boxes above. \n\nYour own voice communication will only be heard by your coaches and fellow students. Your Chat Wheel messages will be seen by your entire team."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_ether_shock_damage"	"傷害："
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shadow_shaman_ether_shock_damage"	"DAMAGE:"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_duel_Lore"	"與石殿的戰士進行單獨的對決幾乎是一項不可能完成的任務。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_legion_commander_duel_Lore"	"To face a soldier of Stonehall in single combat is a challenge few can resist."
"npc_dota_hero_legion_commander_bio"	"在毫無徵兆的情況下，石堂城的城牆裡突然傳來一陣轟隆隆的聲響，數不盡的魔獸大軍從未知的黑色迷霧奔湧而出，他們的挾帶的惡火和邪術讓所有人措手不及。城內的老弱婦孺紛紛慘遭毒手。曾經所向披靡的石堂城軍隊，古銅軍團聞訊火速趕來救援。他們由未嚐一敗的指揮官特蕾絲汀帶領軍團開進城內，只見沿途的巷道已血染成和，市集燃起熊熊大火。士兵們從敵人中殺出一條血路直達入侵的源頭，石堂城的城市廣場中開出一道虛無裂隙，在旁的則是他們的魔軍首領。
首領渾身籠罩著毀滅性的光芒，他二話不說揮舞著大刀將一名士兵劈成了兩半，只見屍首即刻開始腐爛。特蕾絲汀舉起濺滿鮮血的大刀，視線鎖定在這怪物身上。他轉過身來，對著她咧開嘴開始笑，牙齒裂的跟迷宮一般。他們全然不顧周遭的激烈戰鬥向對方衝去。
兩人迅速地纏鬥在一起。每個招數​​都被對方擋下，兩人的拼死決鬥就如舞蹈一般行雲流水，古銅軍團的士兵則在他們周圍一一倒下。特蕾絲汀見對手一刀向她劈來，她縱身一躍，跳到了敵人的身後。局勢頓時出現逆轉，敵人見狀不妙馬上變招，劈砍變成橫切從側面向她切去，剛站穩的她馬上為之一振見招拆招。兩刀相碰，特蕾絲汀順勢使勁，將刀柄下滿是節瘤的敵爪斬下，場上頓時血光一片。其他魔獸見到如此場面早已驚呆，特蕾絲汀趁機發動強攻，將她的長刀刺進敵人的心臟。魔物一聲仰天哀嚎，震散了天上的烏雲，他在痛苦的扭曲中化成了滾滾淤血。深淵的門戶開始顫慄，維繫裂隙的力量就如突現一樣消失的無影無踪。剩下的入侵者也很快倒在​​了石堂城的鐵騎之下。
儘管贏得了勝利，誰也沒有心情慶祝：石堂城滿目瘡痍，傷亡無數。特蕾絲汀重新揚起戰旗，召集了一群友軍。她的憤怒宛如隨時都會爆發一般，誓言要將深淵的魔物大軍趕盡殺絕。"
"[english]npc_dota_hero_legion_commander_bio"	"They came without warning. Within the city walls of Stonehall there came a rumble and a terrible sound, and from blackness unknown came a force of beasts numbering beyond count, wielding flame and foul sorcery, slaying and snatching mothers and sons to dark purpose. Of once-mighty Stonehall's military strength only the Bronze Legion, led by the indomitable Commander Tresdin, was near enough to answer the call of battle. They rode into their city, fighting through bloodstained alleyways and burning markets, cutting their way through the monstrous throng to the source of the sudden invasion: an ethereal rift within the city square, and at its precipice thundered their dreaded champion.
Enwrapped in a corrosive shimmer, the leader of the abyssal horde swung its massive blade, cleaving a legionnaire in two as his flesh began to spoil. Tresdin lifted her blood-stained sword and settled her sights on the beast. It turned, smiling at her through a maze of teeth. Heedless of the battle raging around them, they charged one another.
Deflecting blow after blow, the pair danced their deadly duel as the Bronze Legion met its end around them. Tresdin leapt forward as her foe swung its sword to meet her. The odds turned. The attack smashed into Tresdin suddenly, a brutal thrust from the side, but even as her balance slipped she rallied her strength for another stroke. Blade scraped on blade, beyond the hilt to the gnarled paw below, carving it in two in a fearsome spray of sparks and blood. The vile audience looked on in astonishment as she pressed the attack, driving her blade through her foe's flesh into the stampeding heart within. With a scream that split the clouds above, the beast erupted in a torrent of gore and anguish. The stygian portal wavered, the power sustaining the chasm beyond vanishing as suddenly as it had appeared. The remaining invaders fell quickly to Stonehall steel.
Though victorious, the survivors saw little to celebrate: the city lay in ruins, and survivors were few. Fires continued to spread. Unfurling her banners of war, Tresdin gathered what allies she could. Her anger smoldered as she pledged brutal vengeance upon the forces of the abyss, and damned be any who would dare stand in her way."

"[english]Present4_D1"	"After each game of Dota, you earn XP in your Profile, and every time you level up you earn rewards. You can increase the amount of XP you earn by equipping a Battle Booster, like the one you just received. Equip it in your Player Loadout to try it out."
"Present4_D2"	"當您在裝備戰點加成的期間進行遊戲時，您也會為在場的其他玩家提升他們經驗值的獲取量。多個戰點加成可以互相堆疊，因此一次裝備有多個戰點加成的隊伍將能以飛快的速率獲得戰點。"
"[english]Present4_D2"	"If you play with a Battle Booster equipped, you also increase the XP earned by every other player in your game. Multiple Battle Bonuses stack on top of each other, so parties of boosted players can earn XP at very high rates."

"[english]Present7_D1"	"While playing games, you'll also find various types of Treasures. Each treasure will show you a list of items it may contain, which often include some of the rarest and most valuable items in Dota 2."
"Present7_D2"	"要打開一個寶藏您就必須有著與之對應的鑰匙或印記。我們已經給您了歡迎寶箱的鑰匙囉，所以您現在就可至軍械庫中對著歡迎寶箱點擊滑鼠右鍵來它。至於其它的寶藏您則可以透過從 Dota 2 商店購買鑰匙來打開，或者透過拿東西與其他玩家交換來獲得。"
"[english]Present7_D2"	"To open a Treasure, you need a corresponding key or seal. We've already given you a Welcoming Chest Key, so you can go ahead and open your Welcoming Chest by right-clicking on it in the Armory. For other treasures, you can purchase keys from the Dota 2 Store, or trade with other players to get them."
"Present7_T2"	"更換寶石"
"[english]Present7_T2"	"Changing Gems"
"Present7_D3"	"想要換掉鑲在物品裡頭的寶石嗎？或者想將裡面的寶石放到另一件物品，卻也想要保留它上頭具備的性質？只要透過巧匠之錘您就可以將一格鑲孔內的寶石移除，清出空間來放其它東西。"
"[english]Present7_D3"	"Want to swap out a Gem in an item? Or move a Gem from one item to another while retaining its stats? Use the Artificer's Hammer to remove the Gem from the item it's in, freeing up the socket to put something else in."

"[english]Present8_T1"	"Custom Couriers"
"Present8_D1"	"您剛所收到的這隻健壯野豬是一隻自訂信使，供您取代遊戲內預設的信使來改變它們的樣式。它們就樣自訂守衛一樣屬於玩家物品，因此無論您玩的是哪位英雄都會生效。遊戲中還有許許多多自訂信使，所以不妨找找哪隻合您的風格吧！"
"[english]Present8_D1"	"The Mighty Boar you just received is a cosmetic courier, which replaces the in-game visuals for your courier. Like cosmetic wards, couriers are equipped in your Player Loadout, and take effect no matter which Hero you play. There are many custom couriers, so find one that suits your style!"
"Present8_T2"	"軍械庫擴充器"
"[english]Present8_T2"	"Armory Expanders"
"Present8_D2"	"您的軍械庫的空間是否快要用完了？軍械庫擴充器可以永久擴充您的軍械庫存放物品的空間。要使用它只要先對它點擊右鍵接著選取「擴充」即可。"
"[english]Present8_D2"	"Running out of room in your Armory? Armory expanders permanently increase the amount of storage space you have for items. Right click on the one we've just given you and select 'Expand' to use it."
"Present9_T1"	"自訂廣播語音"
"[english]Present9_T1"	"Custom Announcers"
"Present9_D1"	"在經由玩家裝備面板裝上之後，這種物品將可以替換遊戲內的廣播語音。這些自訂廣播語音通常含有上百條用於各種場合的臺詞，保證您場場遊戲都聽得到不一樣的東西！且就像介面樣式一樣，廣播語音也將能分享給同場遊戲中的其他玩家。"
"[english]Present9_D1"	"When equipped in your Player Loadout, these items will change the in-game announcer voice. Custom announcers often contain hundreds of new, custom lines of dialog that respond to unique events, ensuring you'll hear new lines for many games. Like HUD Skins, Custom Announcers can be shared by others in the game with you."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova"	"Supernova"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova_Description"	"鳳凰欣然結束生命以期重獲新生。它轉化成一顆太陽逐漸燃燒周遭敵人。太陽可被英雄的攻擊摧毀。太陽在 %tooltip_duration% 秒後將會爆炸，暈眩周遭敵人並使鳳凰恢復全部生命值和魔力，同時刷新其他技能的冷卻狀態。\n\n能夠裝備阿哈利姆神杖升級。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova_Description"	"The Phoenix willingly ends its current life for the chance to be reborn. Transforms into a burning sun that scorches enemies in a huge area. The sun can be destroyed by attacks from enemy Heroes. After %tooltip_duration% seconds the sun explodes, stunning all nearby enemies while restoring Phoenix to full health and mana with refreshed abilities.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_phoenix_supernova_Lore"	"超級新星的烈日熔鍊是致命的，但烈焰中的指引之光將永世流傳。"

"npc_dota_hero_phoenix_bio"	"在永世的黑暗中光之守護者的第一顆太陽就此輕微掠過，這一束擁有自我意識的光芒要在虛空裡發光發熱。億萬年裡，這束耀眼的光芒逐漸聚集了無窮的能量，爆發成了一顆超新星。在這烈火之中，如同其起源一樣的光線向四面八方散射，穿透黑暗的汪洋底達各個星座。不久的將來，這些光芒也將成為超新星，以同樣的形式向外傳遞著光和熱。這種奇蹟一般的生命與重生將一直持續到泰坦鬼斧神工的蒼穹被完全點亮為止。在這無盡的輪迴中，被凡人們稱作鳳凰的星星墜落成型，和其先前的光芒一樣，鳳凰也一頭栽入無盡宇宙，在其鄰近的星系中散佈光能。經過長久的輪迴中，他逐漸有了意識並開始了解萬物，在機緣巧合下聽聞有一處地方，由於宇宙的橫生變故進行著經年累月的戰鬥。因此眾星的新生兒化成了生物形態，渴望在最黑暗的地方閃耀他的光和熱。"
"[english]npc_dota_hero_phoenix_bio"	"Alone across an untouched darkness gleamed the Keeper's first sun, a singular point of conscious light fated to spread warmth into the empty void. Through aeons beyond count, this blinding beacon set to coalescing its incalculable energy before bursting forth the cataclysmic flare of supernova. From this inferno raced new beacons, star progeny identical to its parent, who journeyed an unlit ocean and settled in constellatory array. In time, they too would be made to propagate through supernova flame. So would this dazzling cycle of birth and rebirth repeat until all skies hewn of Titan toil deigned to twinkle and shine.
By this ageless crucible the star that mortals would come to call Phoenix collapsed into being, and like its ancestors was thrust into an endless cosmos to find a place among its stellar brethren. Yet curiosity toward that which the dimming elders comfort in the darkness consumed the fledgling, and so over long cycles it inquired and studied. It learned that among worlds both whole and broken would soon stir a nexus of remarkable variety locked in an enduring conflict of cosmic consequence, a plane which would find itself in need of more influence than a dying sun's distant rays could provide. Thus this infant son of suns took terrestrial form, eagerly travelling to shine its warmth upon those who may need it most, and perhaps seize upon its solar destiny."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_sunder_Lore"	"You didn't need that life, did you?  The demon marauder steals that which you hold most dear."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_sunder_hit_point_minimum_pct"	"%最低生命交換值："
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_terrorblade_sunder_hit_point_minimum_pct"	"%MINIMUM HP SWAP:"
"npc_dota_hero_terrorblade_bio"	"恐怖利刃是惡魔中的掠奪者 - 他是個連其他惡魔都畏懼的魔頭，更是一位無法無天的叛逆惡魔。他無視了惡魔們都須宣誓效忠並讓其約束自己言行舉止的惡魔法典，打破了七度地獄的法規。對此他被好好教訓過：就連地獄內都仍有著更令人生不如死的地方。經過一場潦草的殘酷審訊之後恐怖利刃最終定讞要被打入邪穢之淵，那是一處用來禁錮惡魔的監獄，一個現實世界的暗黑倒影；受刑的惡魔必須在這直視自己靈魂倒影中的扭曲深處直到永遠。然而恐怖利刃不但沒有受苦，反而還將自身最邪惡的倒影 - 一個憤怒、嗜竊成性且力量難以想像的自我轉化成了自己能隨心駕馭的魔鬼。藉由潛伏在內心的這隻野獸，恐怖利刃打破了將他困住的畸形牢籠，開始向世界所及的任何角落宣揚他的恐怖法典。"
"[english]npc_dota_hero_terrorblade_bio"	"Terrorblade is the demon marauder--an outlaw hellion whom even other demons fear. A cosmic iconoclast, he stole from the Demon Lords, ignored the codified rites that should have bound his behavior, and broke every law of the seven Infernal Regions. For his crimes, he was taught this lesson: even Hell has a hell. A short, brutal trial ensued, with many dead on all sides, and he was finally incarcerated in Foulfell, a hidden dimension where demonkind imprison their own.
But Foulfell is no normal prison. In this dark mirror of reality, demons are sentenced to gaze eternally into the twisted reflection of their own souls. But instead of suffering, Terrorblade made himself master of his own reflected worst self--a raging, thieving demon of unimaginable power. With his inner beast under sway, he destroyed the fractal prison walls and burst free to turn his terror loose upon all creation."

"dota_tip_beginner_12"	"『優勢路』意指的即是地圖中對您的隊伍來說最深長的路線（兵線）。也就是聖輝方的上路，或者對面魔魘方的下路。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_12"	"The \"Safe Lane\" is the longest lane on your team's side of the river. For the Dire, this is the top lane. For the Radiant, it is the bottom lane."
"dota_tip_beginner_13"	"『劣勢路』意指的即是地圖中對您的隊伍來說最淺短的路線（兵線）。對魔魘方來看是上路，相反的對聖輝方則是下路。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_13"	"The \"Hard Lane\" is the shortest lane on your team's side of the river. For the Dire, this is the bottom lane. For the Radiant, it is the top lane."
"dota_tip_intermediate_3"	"羅煞被擊殺後，將隨機在 8 至 11 分鐘內重生。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_3"	"After Roshan has been killed, he will respawn at a random time between 8 and 11 minutes."
"dota_tip_intermediate_4"	"野怪營地內的中立生物將在開戰後的 30 秒時間點生出第一輪，然後於之後的每個整分時刻刷新一次。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_4"	"Neutral creeps spawn at the 30 second mark, and then at every minute mark thereafter."
"dota_tip_intermediate_5"	"您可藉由按住 Shift 鍵去進行各種操作來將下達的指令串聯起來，使它們依照下達的先後順序無縫地進行。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_5"	"Shift-clicking actions or abilities allows you to queue them."
"dota_tip_intermediate_6"	"某些技能產生的投射物可藉由閃躍匕首或隱身來閃避。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_6"	"Some spells can be dodged by using a Blink Dagger or by becoming invisible."
"dota_tip_intermediate_8"	"隨著由下往上的攻擊將有一定機率落空，且由下往上的視野也會有受到阻隔的可能，因此從高處對敵人進行攻擊將可讓您佔有「 上 」風。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_8"	"Attacking from an uphill position gives you an advantage as an enemy may miss their attacks or lose you in the fog of war."
"dota_tip_intermediate_9"	"使用洞察菸斗的主動功能來產生一道可抵消魔法傷害的抗魔護盾。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_9"	"Using a Pipe of Insight will allow you to negate spell damage from enemy Heroes."
"dota_tip_intermediate_10"	"強襲胸甲可用於加成附近隊友的護甲。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_10"	"Assault Cuirass can be used to boost the Armor of nearby teammates."
"dota_tip_intermediate_11"	"當防禦塔攻擊你時，按下攻擊鍵並點擊友方小兵可以重置防禦塔的目標。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_11"	"When a tower is attacking you, attack-clicking on an allied creep will reset the tower's target."
"dota_tip_intermediate_12"	"在中立野怪營地的附近放置一個守衛或單位以防止該營地於每分鐘整的時刻生出新的一批野怪。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_12"	"Placing a Ward or unit near a neutral creep camp can prevent the creatures in that camp from respawning at the minute mark."
"dota_tip_intermediate_13"	"金箍棒能夠賦予使用者克敵先機能力，令敵人無法藉由迴避能力或屬性，以及處於高地時所提供的躲避率來躲掉您的攻擊。克敵先機對建築物無效。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_13"	"Monkey King Bar will grant you True Strike, which prevents enemy Heroes from evading your attacks, even when attacking uphill. True Strike does not work on enemy structures."
"dota_tip_intermediate_14"	"雙擊閃躍匕首即可用它迅速朝我方泉源的方向進行閃躍。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_14"	"Double-clicking your Blink Dagger will cause you to automatically blink toward your team's fountain."

"compendiumtext_223_diary_1_T_custom6"	"March 15th: A lot of features rolled out since the release of the compendium 5 days ago. The text looks kind of weird now, but that's because it's not part of the background images anymore. The reason for this is that if the translators are as amazing as I think they are, you'll be reading this text in your language (and if not, give them time, they're human!). We are also adding Table of contents (another reason for separating the text from images) and a new Lumi column for Match of the Week. This implied a big rework of most of the compendium pages, so on the upside, it will hopefully fix most spelling mistakes; on the downside, it means no sleepy time for Bruno. And Bruno likes sleepy time. And smoothies. In fact, I'm gonna make me a smoothie now. Hmm, smoothies."

"[english]dota_tip_introduction_5"	"There are \"Side Shops\" at the extreme east and west sides of the battlefield, where several useful items can be purchased."

"[english]dota_tip_introduction_6"	"Some items can only be purchased at a \"Secret Shop\"."

"[english]dota_tip_introduction_7"	"For most heroes, the \"Ultimate\" ability can be learned at level 6, and strengthened at levels 11 and 16."
"dota_tip_introduction_8"	"給予敵方小兵或者英雄最後一擊，取得正補將能讓您獲得額外的金錢和經驗。"
"[english]dota_tip_introduction_8"	"Striking the last hit on a creep or hero will earn you additional gold."
"dota_tip_introduction_9"	"確保您的隊伍擁有一隻信使能夠差遣，好讓前線戰鬥的隊友不用回城就能補給物品。"
"[english]dota_tip_introduction_9"	"Make sure your team has a Courier to bring items to them while they are in the lanes."
"dota_tip_introduction_10"	"在商店範圍之外所購買的物品將會存放在您私人的貯藏庫中，讓您可以先買後領，或者直接叫信使送抵。"
"[english]dota_tip_introduction_10"	"Items purchased while you are away from a shop will be placed in your Stash to be retrieved later, or delivered by your team’s courier."

"[english]dota_tip_universal_1"	"Announcers and HUD Skins are shared between all players in a match. You can choose among them by pressing the Shared Content button on the left side of the Top Bar."

"[english]dota_tip_universal_5"	"Enjoyed playing with someone? Commend them by clicking on their name in the Scoreboard, accessed using the buttons on the left side of the Top Bar."
"dota_tip_universal_6"	"您可以一邊按住左「 Alt 」鍵並朝技能「點擊滑鼠」來迅速告知隊友該技能的冷卻狀態。"
"[english]dota_tip_universal_6"	"You can hold Alt and click on an ability to inform your teammates of that ability's current cooldown status."
"dota_tip_universal_7"	"您可以藉由一邊按住左「 Alt 」鍵並朝位於畫面上方的敵方英雄肖像「點擊滑鼠」來告知隊友他們的行蹤消失了。"
"[english]dota_tip_universal_7"	"You can inform your teammates that an enemy Hero is missing by holding Alt and clicking on that Hero's portrait in the Top Bar."

"[english]dota_tip_beginner_40"	"Strength increases maximum Health. Agility increases Attack Speed. Intelligence increases maximum Mana."
"dota_tip_beginner_41"	"秘密商店的存在其實並不是什麼秘密。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_41"	"The Secret Shop is not actually a secret."
"dota_tip_beginner_42"	"「核心」指的是一種發展緩慢，但發展起來後就變得相當強大的英雄。而「輔助」則是可以強化隊伍的行事效率而非能力的英雄。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_42"	"A \"Carry\" is a hero that gains power slowly, becoming strong late in the game. A \"Support\" hero is often most powerful early in the game, and later enhances their team's effectiveness."
"dota_tip_beginner_43"	"只要您的英雄於敵人死亡時在功績的見證範圍內，您就可以獲得經驗。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_43"	"As long as your Hero is near a kill when it occurs, you will gain experience."
"dota_tip_beginner_44"	"您可以藉由使用「防禦浮雕」去暫時強化我方的建築物，令它們短暫免疫所有外來傷害。功能的冷卻時間相當長，所以務必謹慎使用。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_44"	"You can temporarily fortify your structures, preventing all damage to them, by using the Glyph of Fortification. Use it wisely, as it has a very long cooldown."
"dota_tip_beginner_45"	"使用城鎮傳送卷軸將可以讓您能夠傳送到任何友方的建築物。使用遠行鞋進行傳送則讓您可以傳往任何友方單位。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_45"	"Using Town Portal Scrolls allows you to teleport to any allied structure. Using Boots of Travel allows you to teleport to any allied unit."
"dota_tip_beginner_46"	"我方的信使若遭到擊殺，那麼連帶它所搬運的貨物在內都將有 140 秒的時間無法使用。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_46"	"If your Courier is killed, it will return, along with any items it was carrying, after 140 seconds."
"dota_tip_beginner_47"	"當使用木靈藥去把樹木吃掉時，恢復的生命值並不會因為樹木比較大顆而比較多。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_47"	"When using a Tango, the regeneration is always the same regardless of the size of the tree you consume."
"dota_tip_beginner_48"	"在遊戲外頭有許多的網站都能提供您關於各類詳盡戰術、隊伍的組成，以及您最愛的英雄的打法等知識。"
"[english]dota_tip_beginner_48"	"There are many websites and videos which can provide you with knowledge about overall tactics, team construction, and strategies for your favorite heroes."

"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_23"	"Stuck in your base? You can still make purchases from the Secret Shop by sending your Courier there. Just be careful not to send it into the enemy forces!"
"dota_tip_intermediate_24"	"防禦塔和兵營會在沒有小兵在附近時有著塔防守護，令它們受到較少的傷害，以及能夠恢復在效力加持期間所承受的傷害。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_24"	"When no enemy creeps are near, Towers and Barracks have Backdoor Protection, which lessens the damage they take and allows them to restore their health."
"dota_tip_intermediate_26"	"圓盾、窮鬼盾，以及先鋒盾的傷害抵擋效果所能抵擋的傷害量是依照持盾者的攻擊類型決定，而不是攻擊者的。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_26"	"The Damage Blocked values on a Stout Shield, Poor Man's Shield, and Vanguard refer to the type of Hero carrying the shield, not the type of attacker."
"dota_tip_intermediate_28"	"您可以將單支守衛分享給隊友。先按住 Ctrl 鍵並按下該守衛在物品欄中對應的熱鍵，接著朝對有點擊滑鼠左鍵。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_28"	"You can give a teammate a single ward by holding Control, clicking on the ward in your inventory, then clicking on your teammate."
"dota_tip_intermediate_29"	"閃躍匕首以及原力法杖這兩者都能用來上下峭壁和無法通行的高低交界處。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_29"	"Blink Dagger and Force Staff can be used to climb up and down cliff sides."
"dota_tip_intermediate_30"	"您可以使用壓制之刃砍倒樹木來在叢林中另外開闢出道路。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_30"	"Use a Quelling Blade to cut down trees and carve your own path through the forests."
"dota_tip_intermediate_31"	"幻象、鏡像、小兵，和野怪都不會破除詭計之霧的效果，只有敵方英雄才會。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_31"	"Illusions and creeps will not dispel Smoke of Deceit, only Heroes will."

"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_33"	"Holding Alt will display additional information in the descriptions of several abilities and items."
"dota_tip_advanced_1"	"可靠金錢是種藉由擊殺敵方英雄、信使、羅煞，或者摧毀敵方防禦塔所獲得的金錢種類。所有其它方式獲得的金錢則皆為不可靠金錢，也就是會隨著死亡而失去的金錢。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_1"	"Reliable Gold is earned from killing Heroes, Roshan, and Couriers, from the destruction of enemy Towers, or from using Hand of Midas. All other earnings are Unreliable Gold, which can be lost upon death."
"dota_tip_advanced_2"	"您可以算準時間把最靠近您隊伍優勢路的野怪營地內的中立生物吸引兵線上，令野怪們與您們的士兵交戰。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_2"	"You can pull the creatures in the neutral creep camp that is nearest to your team's Safe Lane into your lane creeps."
"dota_tip_advanced_3"	"遊戲中有許多物品都能夠藉由點擊滑鼠右鍵並選擇「拆卸」將該物品分解回它的合成組件。您可以重複利用那些組件去另外合成新物品。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_3"	"Several items can be broken down into the component parts by right-clicking them in your inventory and choosing \"Disassemble\". Re-use those components to create new items."
"dota_tip_advanced_4"	"使用您的控制群組來在各個單位群之間下達命令。若要編列群組，首先選擇您要編為一組的單位，然後按住左 Ctrl 鍵後再按下數字鍵。若要選擇編好的群組，直接按下該組所對應的數字鍵即可。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_4"	"Use Control Groups to issue orders to different sets of units under your control. To set a Control Group, select a unit or units, hold Control, and press a number. To select that Control Group, press that number."
"dota_tip_advanced_5"	"如果您知道自己難逃一死，趕快趁著自己在死亡掉錢而錯失購買機會之前去使用您的「快速購買」鍵。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_5"	"If you are about to die, use your \"Purchase Quickbuy\" keybinding to spend your gold before it disappears!"
"dota_tip_advanced_6"	"將動力鞋上的屬性切換到智力將能夠給予您一點額外魔力。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_6"	"Swapping the primary attribute on Power Treads to Intelligence can give you a little extra mana."
"dota_tip_advanced_7"	"若您有莫爾迪基安臂章，您可以開啟它的主動功能「不潔之力」來將您生命暫時地提升 475 點。關閉不潔之力後這些暫時提升的生命將會消失，您的生命因為關閉莫爾迪基安臂章的主動功能最低只會下降到 1 點生命（不會致死）。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_7"	"If you have an Armlet of Mordiggian, you can turn on Unholy Strength to temporarily raise your health by 475.  Disabling Unholy Strength will remove the added health, down to a minimum of 1 health."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines"	"埋佈地雷"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_techies_land_mines"	"Land Mines"

"npc_dota_hero_techies_bio"	"在礦工灣所有的傳說故事中，最惡名昭彰的莫過於技工隊的爆破傳奇。因為從此礦工彎就在一夕之間蒸發了，然後起重港也是、捕手鎮也是。事實上，如果有人稍微研究一下技工隊爆破事蹟的歷史就會發現，有爆破技工隊出現過的小鎮過沒多久都會離奇消失。
如同所有技工隊有關的災難，礦工灣的消失是從一項發明開始的。爆破天才斯奎、斯布林和斯布恩負責為地下礦坑設計出安全的引爆方式，而他們發明出史上最古怪的發明：按鈕。只要按一下就能遠處點燃裝置裝引線的玩意兒。
三人組迫不及待地想測試他們的新發明，他們將火鹽炸藥裝了一桶又一桶，狹小的工作坊被塞滿了剛開發出來的遙控炸彈。他們從炸彈堆中扯出一台炸彈礦車，然後將它到很遠的地方。當他們都躲進壕溝後，斯布林按下了引爆的按鈕。但過了一會兒後，啥事都沒發生。他困惑地站了起來，將他的按鈕一按在按，直到地上被炸出一顆大洞。正當它們欣喜若狂時，斯奎和斯布林轉身沒多久，從工作坊的方向便傳來一道巨大的聲波震倒了他們。
出乎意料的爆炸不僅讓他們耳鳴，更讓他們一臉茫然。他們走進烏煙瘴氣的工作坊，而映在眼簾的已是冒煙的廢墟。成堆的木頭和石頭一一墜落至他們前方的大坑洞，而坑洞漸漸地變成ㄧ座深淵。整個礦工灣開始震顫然後逐漸滑落至地下礦坑，城鎮居民開始四處逃竄。
而三人組就坐在懸崖邊看著老家沉沒，他們卻嘴巴張得大大地傻笑，也沒注意到他們很明顯會被他們的鄰居當成罪魁禍首。他們只想知道一件事：他們該怎麼做才能夠引爆更大的爆炸威力？"
"[english]npc_dota_hero_techies_bio"	"In the storied saga of Dredger's Bight, no business has ever been more reviled than Techies Demolitions. Then again, Dredger's Bight no longer exists. Nor does Toterin. Or even Trapper Town. In fact, if one were to track the history of Techies Demolitions they might notice that shortly after Techies appear, towns tend to disappear.
Like every inevitable disaster surrounding Techies, the obliteration of Dredger's Bight began with an invention. Tasked with designing a safer way of detonating explosives in the mines beneath the city, pyrotechnic prodigies Squee, Spleen, and Spoon developed their most outlandish creation yet: a button which, when pressed, would trigger a distant device to spark a fuse.
Overeager to test their invention, the trio stuffed barrel after barrel with flamesalt explosives, piling every corner of their tiny workshop high with the newly developed remote bombs. From this stockpile they plucked a single payload, burying it in a far away field. As they cowered in a ditch, Spleen pressed the detonator button. Yet after a moment, nothing happened. Confused, he stood up, pressing his button again and again until, finally, an explosion tore a hole in the field. Elated, Squee and Spleen turned toward home just as a massive wave of sound and force arrived to knock them over.
Bewildered, their ears ringing from the unexpected blast, they gathered in the dingy miasma to see a smoking ruin where their workshop once stood. Chunks of wood and stone continued to fall as the yawning crater before them slowly deepened into an expanding pit. The whole of Dredger's Bight shuddered, and then gradually started to slide into the mines below as its panicked residents fled.
Sitting at the edge of their sinking home they grinned and giggled, as giddy at the possibilities as they were oblivious to the scorn of their former neighbors. They wondered only one thing: how could they trigger an even bigger blast?"

"[english]Comp_600_PG_page_TOC2elementlistpage_teamshuffle_defines_2"	"TEAM SHUFFLE"
"Comp_600_PG_page_teamshuffletextdescription_text"	"隨著本屆國際錦標賽結束，有許多戰隊皆已開始進行休養。也有的戰隊也早已開始反省著他們在這次大賽中的表現，而有的時候反省的結果將會是一段關係的結束，和新關係的締結。 以粉絲的角度著想，我們十分好奇參予本屆 TI 的各支參賽隊伍現在所經歷的隊內事宜將會如何做收，也認為玩家您們也會對此感興趣。因此我們認為不妨讓玩家們也試試預測他們喜愛的隊伍接下來的發展為何。<br><br>您在接下來的幾頁中將可以進行預測有哪些選手會離去和留下。不管是哪支隊伍都很有可能接下來就會馬上宣布隊伍改組，因此戰隊洗牌預測的填寫作業將會很快地進行鎖定。我們將在一個月之後回顧各個隊伍的隊員陣容，並依照每個預測正確的結果獎勵給您 10 枚互動手冊點數水晶。"
"[english]Comp_600_PG_page_teamshuffletextdescription_text"	"With the conclusion of each International, teams have gone through a process of rest and introspection. Sometimes the result of that is the ending of old relationships, and the beginning of new ones. As fans, we're excited to see how things shake out, and we thought you might be too. So we thought we'd allow us all to take a shot at guessing what'll happen to our beloved teams.<br><br>For each of the 16 teams in TI4, you can select who you think will remain. Predictions will close soon, since any moment teams may announce their new rosters. In a month we'll have a look at how the team rosters stand, and award you 10 compendium points for every correct prediction you made."

"dota_tip_intermediate_36"	"每位英雄都有對於「主要屬性 / Primary Attribute」的歸屬。無論對應到的主要屬性是力量、敏捷，還是智力，英雄們皆會隨著自己的主要屬性有多少而獲得等量的攻擊力。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_36"	"Each hero has a primary attribute of Strength, Agility, or Intelligence. Every point in your hero's primary attribute increases their attack damage by 1."
"dota_tip_intermediate_37"	"從第三次死亡開始，羅煞將會伴隨著死亡一併掉落乳酪。乳酪在經使用後將可瞬間為食用者恢復 2500 點生命和 1000 點 魔力。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_37"	"From his third death onward, Roshan will drop Cheese in addition to the Aegis of the Immortal. Using Cheese instantly refills that hero's health by 2500 and mana by 1000."
"dota_tip_intermediate_38"	"英雄製造出來的幻象會在受到羅煞攻擊後瞬間破滅。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_38"	"Hero illusions are instantly destroyed if they attack Roshan."
"dota_tip_intermediate_39"	"在購買提供靈氣效果的裝備前記得先查看隊友的物品欄。隊上可能已經有了該件裝備，且同性質的靈氣大多都無法進行疊加。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_39"	"Remember to check your allies' inventories before purchasing an item for its aura effect. A teammate may already have that item, and most auras do not stack."
"dota_tip_intermediate_41"	"暈眩效果的持續時間不會疊加，即便效果來自不同的技能仍是如此。因此比起接連覆蓋掉前者的效力，您將可以藉由小心拿捏施放時機去達成更長久的暈眩時間。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_41"	"Stun durations from different skills do not stack. You can keep an enemy stunned for longer with careful timing of your team's skills."
"dota_tip_intermediate_42"	"城鎮傳送卷軸和遠行鞋的傳送施法不會被「沉默 / Silence」或「擊退 / Knockback」效果中斷。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_42"	"Teleports from Town Portal Scrolls and Boots of Travel are not cancelled by silences or knockbacks."
"dota_tip_intermediate_43"	"越靠近「遺跡 / Ancient」的防禦塔就會有著越優渥的摧毀獎金。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_43"	"The closer a Tower is to its team's Ancient, the more gold its destruction will yield."
"dota_tip_intermediate_45"	"「魂戒 / Soul Ring」這件裝備的主動功能即使在角色呈魔力已滿的狀態仍會如實提供額外魔力。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_45"	"Using a Soul Ring will grant you extra mana even if your mana is already full."
"dota_tip_intermediate_46"	"防禦塔將在血量低於 10% 後開放其歸屬陣營進行反補。被自己人反補掉的防禦塔所提供給敵人的賞金將大幅減少。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_46"	"You can destroy allied Towers when they are below 10% health. Denying a Tower drastically reduces how much gold the enemy receives for its destruction."
"dota_tip_intermediate_48"	"記得對那些慷慨解囊購買偵察守衛和動物信使的玩家心懷感謝。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_48"	"Always be nice to those who buy Wards and Couriers."
"dota_tip_intermediate_49"	"物理傷害。所有普通攻擊造成的傷害都屬這類，也有部份的英雄技能和裝備物品會造成物品傷害。它可藉由護甲減免，或藉由虛靈狀態阻擋。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_49"	"Physical Damage, dealt by all regular attacks, some hero abilities, and some items, can be reduced with Armor or blocked by becoming Ethereal."
"dota_tip_intermediate_50"	"魔法傷害。絕大多數的英雄技能和裝備物品所造成的傷害都屬這類。可以藉由魔法抗性減免，或藉由技能免疫抵擋。"
"[english]dota_tip_intermediate_50"	"Magical Damage, dealt by most hero abilities and items, can be reduced with Magical Damage Resistance or blocked by Spell Immunity."
"dota_tip_advanced_9"	"幻影斧在啟動主動功能時將會移除掉發動者身上的一些增幅和減幅，以及使當下正在飛行途中的投射物最後會落空。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_9"	"Activating Manta Style removes several buffs and debuffs, and will cause projectiles that are already in flight to miss."
"dota_tip_advanced_10"	"英雄角色在使用買活進行重生之後，剛才重生等待時間所剩的 25% 將會轉移到下次死亡。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_10"	"After using Buyback, 25% of a hero's remaining respawn time at the time of Buyback is added to their next death."
"dota_tip_advanced_11"	"乳酪可以用 500 金錢的價格賣給商店。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_11"	"Cheese can be sold for 500 gold."
"dota_tip_advanced_17"	"相同的靈氣無法重疊。若您同時身處於多個同性質靈氣的效力範圍內，唯有效力最強的那個才會產生效果。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_17"	"If you are within range of several auras with the same effect, only the most powerful aura will be active."
"dota_tip_advanced_18"	"若您知道自己當下難逃一死，您不妨考慮踏入中立野怪的營地，或進入羅煞的地盤然後讓牠們殺死您。這麼做您將可以防止敵人藉由您的死亡獲得經驗值和金錢獎勵。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_18"	"If you know you are about to die, consider entering a neutral creep camp, or going to Roshan, and letting them kill you instead. This will deny the enemy team the gold and experience earned from your death."
"dota_tip_advanced_19"	"近戰兵營會每秒恢復 5 點生命值。遠程兵營則不具有生命恢復。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_19"	"Melee Barracks regenerate 5 hit points per second. Ranged Barracks do not regenerate."
"dota_tip_advanced_20"	"一點敏捷可以增加英雄 1 點攻擊速度，以及 0.14 點護甲。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_20"	"One point of Agility increases hero attack speed by 1, as well as 0.14 armor."
"dota_tip_advanced_21"	"一點智力可以使最大魔力提升 13 點，以及增加 0.04 點每秒魔力恢復。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_21"	"One point of Intelligence adds 13 maximum mana, as well as 0.04 mana regeneration per second."
"dota_tip_advanced_22"	"一點力量可以使最大生命提升 19 點，以及增加 0.03 點每秒生命恢復。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_22"	"One point of Strength adds 19 maximum health, as well as 0.03 health regeneration per second."
"dota_tip_advanced_23"	"城鎮傳送卷軸的持續施法動作不會中止「影刃」的隱身狀態。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_23"	"Shadow Blade can still be activated while channeling a Town Portal Scroll."
"dota_tip_advanced_24"	"動力鞋可藉由將屬性狀態切換到敏捷去幫助生命或魔力恢復效果的發揮。只要最後不要忘記將屬性切換回去就好。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_24"	"Switching Power Treads to Agility while healing allows your health and mana to restore slightly faster. Just don't forget to switch them back!"
"dota_tip_advanced_25"	"注意！「不朽之守護 / Aegis of Immortal」就和掉落在地上的物品裝備一樣是可以被反補掉的。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_25"	"The Aegis of the Immortal can be denied."
"dota_tip_advanced_26"	"雖然幻象本身不受靈氣影響，但它們仍會攜帶本尊所持有的靈氣，進而影響周遭的單位。"
"[english]dota_tip_advanced_26"	"Though illusions are not affected by auras, they will still grant shared auras from their original hero to nearby units."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_shredder_chakram_2_Description"	"Fires your main saw blade at the target location where it will spin in place, dealing damage in an area around it.  Additionally, for each 5%% of health missing, enemies caught in the saw blade move more slowly. The blade deals damage and cuts down trees in its path when fired and retracted.  While active the ability costs mana, and you lose the ability to attack."

"[english]DOTA_VAC_Verification_Header_Solo"	"Unable to join matchmaking because an issue with your computer is blocking the VAC system.  Please ensure that you are not using any programs that may interfere with VAC and confirm that Steam is correctly installed."
"DOTA_VAC_Verification_Header_Party"	"有人的電腦阻擋了 VALVE 反作弊系統（VAC），故遊戲無法進行配對搜場。請確保您的團隊成員之中沒有人的電腦正在執行會干擾到 VAC 系統運作的程式，並且確認所有團員的 Steam 平台均有正確安裝。"
"[english]DOTA_VAC_Verification_Header_Party"	"Unable to join matchmaking because an issue with your computer is blocking the VAC system of one or more of your party members. "dota_tip_universal_34"	"您可以一邊按住「左 Alt 鍵」然後朝敵方英雄狀態欄中的血量條或魔力條用「滑鼠點擊」來便利地向隊友表示對方的血量和魔量。"
"[english]dota_tip_universal_34"	"Holding Alt and clicking on an enemy Hero's health and mana bars, or your own, will inform your team of that Hero's current health and mana."
"dota_tip_universal_35"	"您可以藉由一邊按住「左 Alt 鍵」去朝狀態欄中的增幅或減幅圖示「點擊滑鼠」來告知隊友您正受其影響。"
"[english]dota_tip_universal_35"	"You can inform your team of active buffs or debuffs on your Hero by holding Alt and clicking on their icons."
"dota_tip_universal_36"	"若您一邊按住左「 Alt 」鍵並朝防禦浮雕「點擊滑鼠」，您將可迅速地告知隊友該功能的冷卻狀態。點擊前若再加上按住左「 Ctrl 」鍵，則還可以告訴隊友還不到它的使用時機。"
"[english]dota_tip_universal_36"	"If you hold Alt and click on the Glyph of Fortification, you will inform your team of its current status. To tell your team not to use the Glyph, hold both Control and Alt while clicking on the Glyph."
"dota_tip_universal_37"	"一邊按住左「 Alt 」鍵，並朝您的復活時間「點擊滑鼠」將可迅速告知您的隊伍自己距離復活還有多久。"
"[english]dota_tip_universal_37"	"Holding Alt and clicking on your respawn timer will announce your current respawn time to your team."
"dota_tip_universal_38"	"使用聊天輪盤來迅速藉由隊頻發送一套預先選定的文字訊息。您可以經由設定選單中更改聊天輪盤會涵蓋的句子。"
"[english]dota_tip_universal_38"	"Use the Chat Wheel to quickly send pre-selected messages to your teammates. Different phrases for the Chat Wheel can be assigned in the settings menu."
"dota_tip_universal_39"	"聊天輪盤中的訊息將會依照玩家在遊戲中使用的語言進行翻譯，所以任誰都看得懂。"
"[english]dota_tip_universal_39"	"Chat Wheel messages are translated to appear in whichever language the receiving player is using."

"DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_0_2"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">第 3 級</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">復活靈氣：\n若有英雄在年獸週遭的 1100 半徑範圍以內死亡，則死亡者將可於 3 秒後復活。每復活一人後需冷卻 20 秒才能再次生效。\n\n多個疊加在一起的輔助走向的奧術靴、梅肯，及復活靈氣的冷卻時間均是各自獨立的。</font>"
"[english]DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_0_2"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">Resurrection Aura:\nIf a hero dies in an 1100 radius of the Beast, it will be resurrected after 3 seconds. "DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_1_0"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\"><b>第 1 級</b></font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">重擊：\n年獸的攻擊有著 12% 機率造成暈眩，持續 1 秒。</font>"

"DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_1_1"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">第 2 級</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">尖刺外殼：\n當有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內時，年獸將隨著受到攻擊使出尖刺外殼，把受到的傷害反射給攻擊者，並暈眩對方。\n狂戰士怒吼：\n當有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 300 以內時，他們將不自主地朝年獸攻擊 2.5 秒。</font>"
"[english]DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_1_1"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">Spiked Carapace:\nIf 2 or more heroes are within 500 range of the Beast, the Beast will stun and reflect damage if attacked.\nBerserker's Call:\nIf there are 2 or more heroes within 300 range of the Beast, they will be forced to attack it for 2.5 seconds.</font>"
"DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_1_2"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">第 3 級</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">強力變形：\n年獸釋放出充滿魔力的煙霧，煙霧將逐漸向外擴散 1000 距離，把接觸到煙霧的敵人通通變成無害的豬 4 秒。\n\n多個疊加在一起的戰鬥走向的重擊的觸發機率，以及狂戰士怒吼、尖刺外殼，和強力變形的冷卻時間均是各自獨立的。</font>"
"[english]DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_1_2"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">Greater Hex:\nThe Beast unleashes a magical smoke that expands outward in a 1000 radius, turning enemy units into harmless pigs for 4 seconds.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Combat Path have independent chances to proc Bash, and independent cooldowns for Berserker's Call, Spiked Carapace, and Greater Hex.</font>"
"DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_2_0"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\"><b>第 1 級</b></font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">攻擊速度靈氣：\n距離年獸 900 範圍內的友方單位的功擊速度將提升 30。</font>"
"[english]DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_2_0"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\"><b>Level 1</b></font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">Attack Speed Aura:\nAllied units gain 30 attack speed in a 900 radius around the Beast.</font>"
"DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_2_1"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">第 2 級</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">萬馬奔騰：\n若有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內，年獸將使出萬馬奔騰，令所有友方單位獲得極速和相位效果，持續 3 秒。</font>"
"[english]DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_2_1"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">Stampede:\nIf there are 2 or more enemy Heroes within 500 range of the Year Beast, it causes a Stampede, and all friendly units gain haste and phase for 3 seconds.</font>"
"DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_2_2"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">第 3 級</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">刷新靈氣：\n友方英雄在距離年獸 900 範圍以內時所施放的法術將有 50%% 的機率會在施放後瞬間刷新。\n\n多個疊加在一起的速度走向的萬馬奔騰的冷卻時間，刷新靈氣的觸發機率均是各自獨立的。</font>"
"[english]DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_2_2"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\n<font color=\"#AAAAAA\">Refresher Aura:\nWhen an allied hero casts a spell within 900 range of the Beast, that spell has a 50% chance to be instantly refreshed.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Speed Path have independent cooldowns for Stampede, and independent chances to proc Refresher Aura.</font>"
"DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_Warning"	"<font color=\"#FF0000\">這將取代現有的升級走向，包括它們的等級！</font>"
"[english]DOTA_CNY_AbilityTooltip_Warning"	"<font color=\"#FF0000\">This will replace the existing upgrade path that you've selected and any of its upgraded levels!</font>"

"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support"	"輔助"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support"	"Support"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">第 1 級</font>\n治療靈氣：\n每隔 2 秒治療位在年獸周遭 1100 半徑範圍內的友方 10 點生命值。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 2</font>\n真實視野：\n給予 1100 半徑距離的真實視野。\n煙霧靈氣：\n英雄當站在年獸附近不動時將進入詭計之霧的隱身狀態。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 3</font>\n復活靈氣：\n若有英雄在年獸週遭的 1100 半徑範圍以內死亡，則死亡者將可於 3 秒後復活。每復活一人後需冷卻 20 秒才能再次生效。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 1</font>\nHealing Aura:\nHeals 10 HP every 2 seconds in a 1100 area of effect around the Beast.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\nTruesight:\nGrants truesight in a 1100 radius.\nThe Beast will use Mekansm and Arcane Boots every 35 seconds in a 750 radius.\nSmoke Aura:\nWhile standing near the Beast, heroes are smoked.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\nResurrection Aura:\nIf a hero dies in an 1100 radius of the Beast, it will be resurrected after 3 seconds.  This effect can only happen once every 20 seconds.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Support Path have independent cooldowns for Arcane Boots, Mek, and Resurrection Aura."
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_aura"	"輔助"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_support_aura"	"Support"

"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat"	"戰鬥"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat"	"Combat"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等 1 級</font>\n重擊：\n年獸的攻擊有著 12% 機率造成暈眩，持續 1 秒。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 2</font>\n尖刺外殼：\n當有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內時，年獸將隨著受到攻擊使出尖刺外殼，把受到的傷害反射給攻擊者，並暈眩對方。\n狂戰士怒吼：\n當有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 300 以內時，他們將不自主地朝年獸攻擊 2.5 秒。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\n強力變形：\n年獸釋放出充滿魔力的煙霧，煙霧將逐漸向外擴散 1000 距離，把接觸到煙霧的敵人通通變成無害的豬 4 秒。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_combat_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 1</font>\nBash:\nThe Beast gains a 12% chance to stun attacked enemies for 1 second.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\nSpiked Carapace:\nIf 2 or more heroes are within 500 range of the Beast, the Beast will stun and reflect damage if attacked.\nBerserker's Call:\nIf there are 2 or more heroes within 300 range of the Beast, they will be forced to attack it for 2.5 seconds.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\nGreater Hex:\nThe Beast unleashes a magical smoke that expands outward in a 1000 radius, turning enemy units into harmless pigs for 4 seconds.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Combat Path have independent chances to proc Bash, and independent cooldowns for Berserker's Call, Spiked Carapace, and Greater Hex."
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed"	"速度"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed"	"Speed"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等 1 級</font>\n攻擊速度靈氣：\n距離年獸 900 範圍內的友方單位的功擊速度將提升 30。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 2</font>\n萬馬奔騰：\n若有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內，年獸將使出萬馬奔騰，令所有友方單位獲得極速和相位效果，持續 3 秒。\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">等級 3</font>\n刷新靈氣：\n友方英雄在距離年獸 900 範圍以內時所施放的法術將有 50%% 的機率會在施放後瞬間刷新。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_description"	"<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 1</font>\nAttack Speed Aura:\nAllied units gain 30 attack speed in a 900 radius around the Beast.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 2</font>\nStampede:\nIf there are 2 or more enemy Heroes within 500 range of the Year Beast, it causes a Stampede, and all friendly units gain haste and phase for 3 seconds.\n\n<font color=\"#FFFFFF\">Level 3</font>\nRefresher Aura:\nWhen an allied hero casts a spell within 900 range of the Beast, that spell has a 50% chance to be instantly refreshed.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Speed Path have independent cooldowns for Stampede, and indepedent chances to proc Refresher Aura."

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_0"	"Speed Aura"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_0_Description"	"等 1 級：\n攻擊速度靈氣：\n距離年獸 900 範圍內的友方單位的功擊速度將提升 30。\n\n等級 2：\n萬馬奔騰：\n若有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內，年獸將使出萬馬奔騰，令所有友方單位獲得極速和相位效果，持續 3 秒。\n\n等級 3：\n刷新靈氣：\n友方英雄在距離年獸 900 範圍以內時所施放的法術將有 50%% 的機率會在施放後瞬間刷新。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_0_Description"	"Level 1:\nAttack Speed Aura:\nAllied units gain 30 attack speed in a 900 radius around the Beast.\n\nLevel 2:\nStampede:\nIf there are 2 or more enemy Heroes within 500 range of the Year Beast, it causes a Stampede, and all friendly units gain haste and phase for 3 seconds.n\nLevel 3:\nRefresher Aura:\nWhen an allied hero casts a spell within 900 range of the Beast, that spell has a 50% chance to be instantly refreshed.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Speed Path have independent cooldowns for Stampede, and independent chances to proc Refresher Aura."
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_1"	"速度靈氣"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_1"	"Speed Aura"
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_1_Description"	"等 1 級：\n攻擊速度靈氣：\n距離年獸 900 範圍內的友方單位的功擊速度將提升 30。\n\n等級 2：\n萬馬奔騰：\n若有 2 名以上的敵方英雄與年獸的距離近於 500 以內，年獸將使出萬馬奔騰，令所有友方單位獲得極速和相位效果，持續 3 秒。\n\n等級 3：\n刷新靈氣：\n友方英雄在距離年獸 900 範圍以內時所施放的法術將有 50%% 的機率會在施放後瞬間刷新。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_1_Description"	"Level 1:\nAttack Speed Aura:\nAllied units gain 30 attack speed in a 900 radius around the Beast.\n\nLevel 2:\nStampede:\nIf there are 2 or more enemy Heroes within 500 range of the Year Beast, it causes a Stampede, and all friendly units gain haste and phase for 3 seconds.\n\nLevel 3:\nRefresher Aura:\nWhen an allied hero casts a spell within 900 range of the Beast, that spell has a 50% chance to be instantly refreshed.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Speed Path have independent cooldowns for Stampede, and independent chances to proc Refresher Aura."
"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_2"	"速度靈氣"

"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_cny2015_speed_2_Description"	"Level 1:\nAttack Speed Aura:\nAllied units gain 30 attack speed in a 900 radius around the Beast.\n\nLevel 2:\nStampede:\nIf there are 2 or more enemy Heroes within 500 range of the Year Beast, it causes a Stampede, and all friendly units gain haste and phase for 3 seconds.\n\nLevel 3:\nRefresher Aura:\nWhen an allied hero casts a spell within 900 range of the Beast, that spell has a 50% chance to be instantly refreshed.\n\n\nMultiple instances of Speed Path have independent cooldowns for Stampede, and independent chances to proc Refresher Aura."

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_hybrid_Description"	"變體精靈化身成虛實混體，一個與目標友方英雄近乎相同的複製品。虛實混體可施放除終極技能外真身具備的任何技能。變體精靈本尊會於虛實混體死亡或其持續時間結束時重新出現。\n\n虛實混體會在場上已有變體精靈的複製品時無法使用。"
"[english]DOTA_Tooltip_ability_morphling_hybrid_Description"	"Morphling becomes a hybrid replication of a target allied hero, and can cast all of that hero's non-ultimate abilities. Morphling will reappear at the location of the hybrid if it dies, or when its duration ends.\n\nCannot be cast while Morphling has an active Replicate."

"[english]Comp_2733_PG_page_levelelementlistdescription_details_text"	"There is no maximum to your Compendium level. Starting at level 160 and every 10 levels onward, you will be granted an alternating Immortal Treasure (e.g. Treasure I at 160, Treasure II at 170, etc.).<br>At level 175 and every 50 levels onward, you will be granted a Coin Prediction Charm.<br>At level 185 and every 50 levels onward, you will be granted an International 2015 Effigy Reforger Pack.<br>Starting at level 250 and every 50 levels onward, you will be granted +25% Challenge Coin Rate."

"Comp_2733_PG_page_rewardselementlistdescription_details_text"	"互動手冊等級並沒有上限。您的互動手冊自 160 級開始每再升 10 級都再將以輪流的方式給您一款不朽寶藏（例如 160 級時給不朽寶藏 I，170 級時給不朽寶藏 II）。自 175 級開始每升 50 級您都將再獲得一個金幣預測護符。自 185 級開始每升 50 級您都將再獲得一個 2015 國際錦標賽英雄雕像重製包。自 250 級開始每升 50 級您隨著完成互動手冊挑戰的金幣獲得比率都將再提升 25% 。達貢權杖、魔瓶等自訂特效將於 2015 年 9 月 7 日到期。"
"[english]Comp_2733_PG_page_rewardselementlistdescription_details_text"	" There is no maximum to your Compendium level. Starting at level 160 and every 10 levels onward, you will be granted an alternating Immortal Treasure (e.g. Treasure I at 160, Treasure II at 170, etc.). At level 175 and every 50 levels onward, you will be granted a Coin Prediction Charm. At level 185 and every 50 levels onward, you will be granted an International 2015 Effigy Reforger Pack. At level 250, and every 50 levels onward, you will be granted +25% Challenge Coin Rate. Custom effects like Dagon, Bottle, etc. will be available until September 7th, 2015."

"[english]Comp_2733_PG_page_collector_cacheelementlistdescription_text"	"Created by the community and available for purchase only to Compendium owners, the Collector's Cache contains new mythical sets and the chance to also contain 11 Compendium levels, or an ultra-rare Immortal Faceless Rex Courier. Each set in the Cache can be recycled to gain 2 Compendium levels, and additional levels are granted after opening 1, 5 and 11 treasures.
